Welcome to Students, Parents or visitors!

On behalf of our faculty and staff, welcome to Nagarjuna Group of Educational Organisations. Your success matters to us, and we are here to help guide and direct you to your ultimate educational and career goals. We provide an array of services which will help you succeed in achieving success no matter if your goal is to complete a course or a complete degree program. I encourage you to access all our services and ask any one of our professional staff on given mail on our contact address to assist you with your educational endeavors. I congratulate you for choosing such a wonderful educational institution.

On behalf of our faculty and staff, welcome to Nagarjuna Group of Educational Organisations. Your success matters to us, and we are here to help guide and direct you to your ultimate educational and career goals. We provide an array of services which will help you succeed in achieving success no matter if your goal is to complete a course or a complete degree program.........

It’s my great pleasure to welcome you to the Nagarjuna Academy web site. We have been progressing academically since 1988 to fulfill the needs of quality education that our country needs in the present ICT Era. This site is a diminutive profile of Nagarjuna Academy in which you will acquire academic information for those who seek to hone their professional skills and enrich their academic background for upgrading their potentiality and exploring their capacity. Here you can surf into our different academic programmes of Nagarjuna Academy High school, which has classes from Pre-school children to SLC, +2 and Nagarjuna International College with BIM, B Sc CSIT and BBS programme of Tribhuvan University/Nepal. We are always towards to develop this site as an interactive forum for students and teachers where one can share and views each other’s academic stuff as articles, projects, information and so on. The main objective of Nagarjuna Academy is to fortify the students with all-round knowledge and to quip them with the managerial, practical and personal skills, which are very essential to vie in a highly competitive present global scenario. We have strong team of caliber academic and administrative faculties and staff with fully equipped modern computer lab. with unlimited high bandwidth internet facilities, science laboratories and resourceful library to provide ample opportunities to attain perspective goals of your life. We are always towards maintaining the quality not the quantity. Since student’s life is not solely concerned with academic pursuit; therefore we have scheduled sufficient provisions for extracurricular activities. Nevertheless cost and quality are the two sides of the same coin; we have kept the cost expenditure as affordable as possible. Thank you for using this app. Wish you all the best.

Mr. Sunil Bikram Sijapati 
Executive Director Nagarjuna Academy
